title: Health workers in China are killing pets while their owners are in quarantine
content:
1. Health workers in China are killing pets while their owners are in quarantine  NPR
  2. The killing of a corgi shows how government power has grown unchecked in China in the name of Covid prevention  CNN
  3. China city apologizes, worker beat dog to death when owner quarantining  Insider
  4. China Left in Shock Following Brutal Killing of Corgi During Covid-19 Disinfection  The Wall Street Journal
  5. China Covid: Outrage after pet dog killed by health workers  BBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
